data.title: Chris Sarandon : Shows
data.meta_description: LCT: Preludes (LCT3), The Light in the Piazza. Broadway: Cyrano De Bergerac, Nick and Nora, Two Gentlemen of Verona, The Rothschilds. Off-Broadway: Through a Glass Darkly, Marco Polo Sings a Solo, The Devil’s Disciple, The Woods. Film: I Smile Back, ...
data.text:
Chris Sarandon

LCT: Preludes (LCT3), The Light in the Piazza. Broadway: Cyrano De Bergerac, Nick and Nora, Two Gentlemen of Verona, The Rothschilds. Off-Broadway: Through a Glass Darkly, Marco Polo Sings a Solo, The Devil’s Disciple, The Woods. Film: I Smile Back, Safe, Loggerheads, Little Men, Just Cause, Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas, Fright Night, The Princess Bride, Forced March, Child’s Play, Protocol, Cuba, The Sentinel, Lipstick, Dog Day Afternoon (Academy Award nomination). TV: “God in America,” “The Good Wife,” “Psych,” “Law & Order: SVU,” “Law & Order,” “The Court,” “ER,” “Judging Amy,” “Stark Raving Mad,” “Felicity,” “Chicago Hope,” “A Tale of Two Cities” (Hallmark Hall of Fame).
